ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Connect time?
ygData.msgSnippet: After Accept just hit space or enter 2 or 3 times (depending if you have the intro movie installed) to skip the first screens. As for the 3DFX splash, it has
ygData.messageBody:
After Accept just hit space or enter 2 or 3 times (depending if you have the
intro movie installed) to skip the first screens. As for the 3DFX splash, it
has nothing to do with EQ. It's your computer telling you that you are now
running in 3D mode, this can be disabled with your graphic card software.
This probably changed to default on your card when you reinstalled/upddated
your graphic drivers or DirectX.

domi

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [SMTP:suceress@...]
> Sent: Saturday, April 21, 2001 8:51 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Connect time?
>
> I've noticed that not only does it take longer to connect but it takes
> longer to go through all the screens they pop up at you when you are
> loading
> the game. That thing that you have to click to accept is annoying, then
> all
> those other screens. and now they've added an aditional screen that
> flashes
> 3dfx after you've selected your server. It is soo annoying. sometimes I'm
> in
> a hurry to get back on and I don't need the hassle of putting up with all
> those graphics and junk.
> luv,
> -Su
>
